definition: dynastic records of imperial China
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to balance an account/accountancy/accounting
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
to demand/to request/to coerce

sentences.english: Fixating on a single enemy at the expense of everything else is likely to get you flanked and killed.
sentences.chinese: 只盯着一個敵人而不顧其他可能會要你的命。

sentences.english: I see, but don’t expect too much. The director will need to see it by today.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，不過指望別太大，主任今天肯定會要的。

sentences.english: Unable to resist, the sailor asks "How'd you end up with a peg-leg?"
sentences.chinese: 海員忍不住了，他問“你爲什麼會要裝上假木腿？”

sentences.english: At checkout time a hotel guest will ask the front desk to prepare the final bill for payment.
sentences.chinese: 結帳時，客人會要前臺準備付款結算單。

sentences.english: The fraternities on campus are a bunch of guys, they make you pay.
sentences.chinese: 學校的兄弟會是一羣男學生組成的，他們會要你交錢。

sentences.english: How could a Chihuahua kill a Rottweiler?
sentences.chinese: 吉娃娃怎麼可能會要了羅特韋爾的命？

sentences.english: And ift they don't have the first, the others two will kill you.
sentences.chinese: 如果他們少了第一項，那麼其他兩項會要了你的命。

sentences.english: Sir, you have a meeting on Friday at 3 pm.
sentences.chinese: 老闆，週五下午三點半你還有一個會要開。

sentences.english: If they aren't clear, you may be asked to have more X-rays done.
sentences.chinese: 如果圖像不清晰，可能會要你再做X光。

sentences.english: Pen box tooling T1 test, just come out late this afternoon, still some fine tune be needed.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午剛試出的筆盒模，還有些小問題會要修正。

sentences.english: How many of you Indians want cheapo Chinese goods badly???
sentences.chinese: 你們印度人有多少會要中國廉價商品？

sentences.english: I was bigger, older, yet losing?
sentences.chinese: 我個頭大歲數大，怎麼會要輸？

sentences.english: I bet Dad will make David pay something toward the cost of the replacement plants.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸一定會要大衛出點錢，作另購植物的費用。

sentences.english: Mr. Bush's reception in Thailand is likely to be much more sedate.
sentences.chinese: 布什總統在泰國受到的迎接場面可能會要平靜得多。

sentences.english: Drink-driving may cost you your life.
sentences.chinese: 酒後駕車可能會要了你的命。

definition: to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
at the minimum/at the very least
moreover/besides/in addition/furthermore
can't say for sure/maybe
to let off/to let slip by/to let sb get away with sth
ought to/should/must
it doesn't matter
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
this side/here
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
right or wrong?/Is it right?/OK, yes? (colloquial)
to press charges/to file a complaint
to tell/to inform/to let know
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
(it's) no wonder (that...)/(it's) not surprising (that)
to wish/to want/ready/willing (to do sth)
